metadata.title: CVE-2015-2172 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
DokuWiki before 2014-05-05d and before 2014-09-29c does not properly checkpermissions for the ACL plugins, which allows remote authenticated users togain privileges and add or delete ACL rules via a request to the XMLRPCAPI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2172` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20140929.d-1ubuntu1').
